title: Kimi ni Suki tte Iwasetai
original_name: 君に好きっていわせたい
sinopse:
A collection of Takeshima Eku's short yuri stories.

1. Kimi ni Suki tte Iwasetai
2. Kimi ga Suki tte Ittekita
3. Uchi no Neko ga Kawaii Youjo ni Naru Nante!
4. Super Maid ni Omakase Kudasai!
5. NEET Na Oneesan Hiroimashita.
6. Miyuri no Shiro-chan
7. Hen Ai
